title: Tiers
description: In Preparation for machine tiers, should the sidebar be reworked (notably machines and such)?

replies.body:
I think we'll have to see how the Tiers are set up exactly, but yes the sidebar will need a rework when that happens.

My first thoughts on it are to use some variant of the Category Pages idea. Have one page for each Tier, listing properties of the tier and machines in that tier, and then have one page for each machine, describing the functions of that machine across all tiers.
The sidebar itself could be laid out with a 'Tiers' section, containing links to the (7?) Tier pages.

We may also need to segregate the wiki into 1.7 information and 1.6 information, what with how many things are changing.
I wish we could directly edit CSS and HTML on wikispaces... it would be so much easier.
